page.title: 03LAXDALE HOUSING PART 2
page.content: The number of owner-occupier house- holders has increased in recent years. The{Trust}has sold{feus}of land of approximately 1/4 acre to interested buyers on which to build their private homes. Within the past ten years a new housing estate has been built by the local authority consisting of terraced houses and flats. Four years ago additional houses were built on the estate and these are mainly semi- detatched. We examined the houses village by village and found that in each,the housing was mixed i.e. pre-war 1930 type houses and recently built bungalow type, apart from {Marybank}where there is a street of pre-war semi-detached two-storey houses,as well as the crofter-type houses.
